Feb 9, 2012

Time In Words available in the App Store

Time In Words is now available at the App Store. Time In Words is a clock and calendar app that takes you out of the digital era and back to when saying “quarter to seven” or “five past two” was accurate enough. Check out the Time In Words web page for more info and screen shots.

Jan 13, 2012

New site for TrozWare

Following the launch of Pic-a-POD for Mac and iOS in the relevant App Stores, I decided that it was time for a new look web site. Pic-a-POD has it’s own dedicated web site, so it seemed logical to make a more product oriented site, using the same look & feel. I have maintained some parts of the old site – LiveCode and On-Rev samples can be found in the Resources section, as can legacy version...
